entry.title: New Releases Restoring Compatibility
entry.author: Lukas Krejci
entry.summary: Revapi has started to use Java 9 for building while maintaining compatibility with Java 8 using the Animal Sniffer Maven plugin. This has proven to be problematic and the last releases could not be used with Java 8. This should be now fixed and compatibility with Java 8 restored.

entry.title: New Revapi Java Extension Release
entry.author: Lukas Krejci
entry.summary: It was discovered that the analysis may fail if it encounters classes that are missing from the dependency graph in certain situations. This should now be fixed and all users are encouraged to upgrade to using revapi-java-0.14.4 if possible.
